title: I Love New York T-Shirt
content:
I can’t figure out what font was used for this shirt. Can anyone please help me identify it?

[code]http://generallyawesome.com/store/i\_luv\_nyW.jpg[/code]

 [‹ Modern Italic Sans Serif - (building better brands)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34124 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Font in logo - Diavlo {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34239 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nevelle flynn

comments.content: ITC American Typewriter is the closest.
